package.name: pick_and_place
package.description:
Modular pick-and-place system with QR code scanning for mobile manipulator.
Features: - State machine orchestrator for pick-and-place workflow - QR code scanning service using pyzbar - MoveIt integration for arm control - Nav2 integration for autonomous navigation - Configurable locations and arm poses
Workflow: 1. Navigate to pickup location 2. Pick up object with QR code attached 3. Move arm to show QR to camera 4. Scan QR code to get destination name 5. Navigate to destination 6. Place object and return (continuous loop)
